description:
Calendar dates were shifted by a random amount of days as part of the data de-identification process. All calendar dates for a given subject have been offset by the same amount of days. Item from Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory. [Varni, Seid, and Rode 1999 (PubMed ID: 10024117)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10024117/)

[Search for all PedsQL variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=pedsql)
